name: Potato Explosion Dragon
description:
Place the troops on the battle field and watch them fight.

click on a troop in the hud to select it, then, click on the battle field to place it.

press R or the red button on the top right to clear batllefield.

press the blue button on the top right to go back to the menu.

Press enter or one of the potatoes in the hud to start the battle.
